author: TravisEz13
body:
Investigate why `Test-FileCatalog should pass when catalog is in the same folder as files being tested` passes in other CI system and fails in VSTS

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/7536/files#diff-213bb805a27c1e70b89fc95d3b5870ae
title: Investigate why `Test-FileCatalog should pass when catalog is in the same folder as files being tested` passes in other CI system and fails in VSTS
